name: MIFFED
description:
HAVING TROUBLE WITH WEBGL? TRY GOOGLE CHROME OR OUR WINDOWS BUILD

Edith has gone out for her weekly shop at Maldi, but these queues are getting ridiculous, and poor, unstable old Edith has had enough! Fight your way through the store and show them all just how MIFFED you are! Keep yourself as angry as possible while fighting through the hordes of fellas just trying to do their best

  • Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Camera Movement
  • Left-Click - Fire Weapon
  • 1,2,3,4 - Switch Weapons (1 - handbag, 2 - Ketchup, 3 - Eggs, 4 - Champagne)
  • Esc - return to main menu
